sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>working</description>
        <name>extracting single question ans trail</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var parent_record = new GlideRecord('dmn_demand');
if (parent_record.get('1cb9d28847a93950020ba9f8536d433e')) {
    var survey_response = new GlideRecord('asmt_metric_result');
    survey_response.addQuery('instance', 'cfe91a8847a93950020ba9f8536d43df');
    survey_response.addQuery('metric.name', 'Functional Business Group').addOrCondition('metric.name', 'Functional Sub Group Area');
    survey_response.query();

    var a1 = [];

    while (survey_response.next()) {
        if (survey_response.hasNext()) {
            a1 += survey_response.string_value + ',';
        } else {
            a1 += survey_response.string_value;
        }
    }
    parent_record.short_description = a1;
    gs.print(a1);
    parent_record.update();

}
var dmnResult = new GlideRecord('u_demand_results');
    dmnResult.initialize();
    dmnResult.u_number = parent_record.sys_id;
    dmnResult.u_title = parent_record.short_description;
	dmnResult.u_shrt_desc = parent_record.business_case;
	dmnResult.u_additional_comments = parent_record.short_description;
    dmnResult.insert();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>Eshwitha</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-09-23 11:23:17</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8bf9be48476d3950020ba9f8536d437f</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>extracting single question ans trail</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_8bf9be48476d3950020ba9f8536d437f</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>Eshwitha</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-09-23 11:35:21</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
